verses.content: “Mi nuhmei inei taphawt chu, Ni sâwtnawtêa ding, buoinaa sip a nih.
Pâr angin a hung suok a, a vuoi hlak, Hlim angin a tlân a, a um zing ngai nawh.
Mi chuong ang mi chunga chun i mit i mengin, Nangma le rorêlnaa chun i mi ṭhuoi a ni maw?
Tuin am thil inthieng nawa inthawkin thil inthieng la suok thei an ta? Tukhawma thei naw ni hai.
A nihai chu biruot a na, a thla ni zâthai khawm chu nangma kuomah a um a, Nang chun a fe pei thei nawna dingin a ramrihai chu i khang tâk hnung chu.
A châwl theina dingin, ama nghatsan rawh, Inhlawfa anga a ni chu a suktling hmakhat chun.
Thing ta ding chun beiseina a um, phûr ni sien khawm inder nâwk a tih; Chun, chu a kâu innohai chu vuoi naw ni.
A zung chu hnuoia chun hung tar sienla khawm, A kûng chu leihnuoia chun thi sien khawm,
Tui riminhnikna lei chun la hung inder a ta, Thil phun angin a zârhai hung zâr suok a tih.
Nisienlakhawm, mihriem chu a thih a, a rîral tah a; Anih, mihriem chun a thlarau ân thlah a, khâwlai am a um ta leh?
Tuihai chu tuisuorieta inthawka a fe hmang a, Vadung chu a hung kang a, a hung ṭâwl angin;
Chuong ang chun mihriem chu a zâl a, a thonâwk ta nawh; Vânhai chu a um naw hmakhat chun, tho ta naw ni hai a, An innaa inthawk chun keitho ni bawk naw ni hai.
“Aw, Seola chun mi lo thup tah ni la chu, I lunginsenna a fe hmang hmakhat chu inrûkin mi lo kawl i ta, Hun bîk mi ruotpêkin, i mi hriet zing ding bah!
Mi a thi chun a hring nâwk ding am a nih? Ka nihai po po chu nghâk ka tih, Insuoa ka umna chu a hung tlung hmakhat chun.
Nangin mi hung ko i ta, keiin lo dawn ka ti che, I kuthai sinthaw chu ditna i nei ding annâwm.
Amiruokchu, tuhin nang chun ka kalchawihai i tiemin, Ka suolna chu i enthlit zing naw am a nih?
Ka bawsietna chu ipa khitkhum a na, Nangin ka khawhlona chu i ṭhuikhum a.
Matheiloin tlâng chu chimin teplo hung nîng a ta, Lungpui khawm chu a hmuna inthawka sawn nîng a tih.
Tuihai chun lunghai chu an hrût hek a, Tui inkhâwhai chun hnuoia pil chu an lên hmang a, Chun, nang chun mihriem beiseina chu i sukbo a.
Ama chu kumkhuoin i hneha, ama chu a fê hmang ta a, A hmêlput chu i thleng a, i tir hmang tah a.
A naupasalhai chu inzâumin an hung um a, ama chun a hriet nawh a, Chun, siehnuoi an hung na, a hriet chuong bawk nawh.
Amiruokchu, a tisa chun a chunga chun natna a nei a, Chun, a lungril chu a sûnga chun ân rûm bawk a,” tiin.
